titles.title: Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development Act
Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development Act
Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development Act
A bill to include Alaska Natives in a program for Native culture and arts development.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6852)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Approved for reporting with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Inouye with an amendment. With written report No. 103-184.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 287.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

term.name: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Passed Senate amended. Alaska Native Culture and Arts Development Act - Amends the Higher Education Amendments of 1986 to include Alaska Natives in a program for native culture and arts development.
